params.expiryAt: When the task becomes invalid (0 for no expiry)
params.value: ETH/value to be sent with the call

executeTask(address,address,bytes32,uint.notice: Execute a pre-approved task from Scheduler

executeTask(uint256).notice: Execute a scheduled task via Executer

getPendingTasks(uint256,uint256).notice: Get pending tasks within a time range

scheduleTask(uint64,uint64,address,bytes.notice: Schedule a new task via Executer
